description: Hyperwall settings for OECD Chemistry (1.04), years 2001+

forces.comment: These force parameters are used by nbody.

heatmap.comment: If 'sql_meta_field' is set it is used for heat, otherwise time ordered IDs are used. Possible types: int,uint,real

meta_table.comment: This table is used to load meta data for all the papers.
meta_table.name: meta_data
meta_table.where_clause: (maincat = 'dy' OR maincat = 'ei' OR maincat = 'ee' OR maincat = 'ea' OR maincat = 'ec' OR maincat = 'hq' OR maincat = 'uy' OR maincat = 'dw' OR maincat = 'fi') AND year >= 2001 AND title IS NOT NULL AND keywords IS NOT NULL

refs_table.comment: This table is used to load the graph of references in nbody.
refs_table.name: pcite

map_table.comment: This table is used to store output from nbody. It can serve as input for both tiles and nbody.
map_table.name: map_data
